Partnerships for Improved Data

• A common complaint (from management and staff, from across the US): Eliminate NCDC QC Errors As Early As Possible.

across the US): Eliminate NCDC QC Errors As Early As

precipitation gauge with wetness sensor. • Double-alter wind fence, stainless steel. • Newer CS 1000 datalogger, 34 months data storage. • GOES DCS comms. • 5-minute data reported hourly; 7-layer comms. • AC or Solar Power. • Modular: expandable, upgradable. • Data Standards same as Standard CRN Sta. • Weight: ~650-800 Lbs (solar pwr is heavier). • Cost: ~28K, calibrated & ready for deployment.
precipitation gauge with wetness sensor.
• Double-alter wind fence, stainless steel.

• GOES DCS comms.
• 5-minute data reported hourly; 7-layer comms.
• AC or Solar Power.
• Modular: expandable, upgradable.
• Data Standards same as Standard CRN Sta.

What is NIDIS?
What is NIDIS?

National Integrated Drought Information System NIDIS: An integrated, interagency national drought monitoring and forecasting system that provides:
National Integrated Drought Information System
NIDIS: An integrated, interagency national drought N I D I S : A n
i n t e g r a t e d ,
i n t e r a g e n c y
n a t i o n a l
d r o u g h t
monitoring and forecasting system that provides:

An early warning & forecast system for drought. Drought impact and causation education. Information for drought mitigation. An interactive, web-based drought portal. Improved observational capabilities.

NIDIS Drivers
NIDIS Drivers

Western Governor’s Association •
Western Governor’s Association
•

1996: Recommendation for national preparation for and response to drought. 2000: Creation of National Drought Policy Commission. 2003: Partnership with NOAA to improve drought monitoring and forecasting. 2004: Formal document published recommending NIDIS.

U.S. Congress

The 109th Congress introduced H.R. 5136/S. 2751 to improve national drought preparedness, mitigation and response efforts.
The 109th Congress introduced H.R. 5136/S. 2751 to improve national
drought preparedness, mitigation and response efforts.

President’s National Science & Technology Council •
President’s National Science & Technology Council
•

Highlighted drought as one of the grand challenges for disaster reduction in 2005. Proposed action: developing an implementation plan for NIDIS.

in 2005.

U.S. Drought Portal
U.S. Drought Portal

The USDP will provide county, regional and national drought-related products (analysis, forecasts, and research) to a variety of users through a dynamic, Internet-based drought portal.

national drought-related products (analysis, n a t i o n a l

p r o d u c t s ( a n a l y s i s ,
forecasts, and research) to a variety of users
